description: This file defines the root layout component and related configuration for a Remix web application, including linking stylesheets, setting up page structure, and exporting the main app component.

methods.name: links
methods.description: A function returning link elements for preconnecting to fonts and loading a Google Fonts stylesheet.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: A React component defining the overall HTML layout for the app, including metadata, links, and page content slot.

methods.name: App
methods.description: The main React component rendering the current route's outlet (page content).
